TopicTitle: What does KSP mean to you?

Articles.Content: While reading a thread about a mod I saw the acronym PAW and wondered what it meant. That lead me to the thread linked below. It looked like everyone had a quick bit of fun even after the question was answered (Part Actions Window in case you wondered). So I ask what does KSP mean to you? Feel free to get kerbally with your words. I'll start         Kan't Stop Playing
